name: Lucky Clover: Pot O' Gold
description:
Fun for the kids - join the magical Leprechaun "Shamrock" in an adventure through Mystical Realms. Find the hidden Magic Charms on each enchanted location to win Shamrock's Gold!

TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME!

✶✶✶✶✶ FEATURES ✶✶✶✶✶

✓ Dozens O' New Levels!
✓ 60 Beautiful Locations
✓ New Magic Charms!
✓ 5 Unique Gameplay Styles
✓ Hours of Gameplay
✓ New Shamrock Voice and Animations!

Languages Supported: English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Brazilian Portuguese, Dutch, Swedish, Russian, Japanese, Chinese, Korean
